data.name: AccessText.UseMainView.Incident
data.value: _Use the Worker Deployment Record to collect basic accountability information each time a worker is deployed to the incident

data.name: AccessText.UseMainView.Worker
data.value: _Use the Worker Rostering Form to collect rostering and credentialing information for each worker in your organization

data.name: Body.ConfirmAssetDeletion
data.value:
File: {0}
This file will be moved to the Recycle Bin.

data.name: Body.ConfirmOrphanAssetCreation
data.value:
Location: {0}
ERHMS Info Manager will only recognize files that are in the same location as the current project. Continue with this location anyway?

data.name: Body.ConfirmRecentProjectRemoval
data.value:
Project: {0}
This project will be removed from the list of recent projects.

data.name: Body.ConfirmViewCreation
data.value:
Form: {0}
No form with this name was found in the project. Create a standard {1}?

data.name: Body.ConfirmViewDeletion
data.value:
Form: {0}
This form, any related forms, and all associated records will be permanently deleted. This action cannot be undone.

data.name: Body.ConfirmWorkerProjectChange
data.value:
Project: {0}
Multiple worker projects are not supported. ERHMS Info Manager will only recognize workers who have been entered into the current project's Worker Rostering Form. Continue changing the worker project anyway?

data.name: Body.FatalError
data.value:
ERHMS Info Manager has encountered an error and must shut down.

data.name: CoreView.HelpText.AfterActionReview
data.value: Filled out as necessary after deployment. Collects feedback on the organization's ERHMS program.

data.name: CoreView.HelpText.DeploymentHealthSurvey
data.value: Filled out at least weekly during deployment for each worker. Collects information on acute health effects.

data.name: CoreView.HelpText.PostDeploymentHealthSurvey
data.value: Filled out as necessary after deployment. Collects information on chronic health effects.

data.name: CoreView.HelpText.PreDeploymentHealthSurvey
data.value: Filled out annually for each worker. Collects information on baseline health status.

data.name: CoreView.HelpText.WorkerActivityReport
data.value: Filled out daily during deployment for each worker. Collects information on work location and activity.

data.name: CoreView.HelpText.WorkerDeploymentRecord
data.value: Filled out once per deployment for each worker. Collects basic accountability information.

data.name: CoreView.HelpText.WorkerInProcessingForm
data.value: Filled out once per deployment during mobilization for each worker. Collects information on current health status and training/PPE distribution.

data.name: CoreView.HelpText.WorkerOutProcessingForm
data.value: Filled out once per deployment during demobilization for each worker. Collects information on training/PPE effectiveness.

data.name: CoreView.HelpText.WorkerRosteringForm
data.value: Filled out once for each worker and reviewed annually. Collects rostering and credentialing information.

data.name: CreateView.Body.SetWithWorkerInfo
data.value: If you choose to collect worker information, the form will contain fields for worker name, email address, and ID. You can use these fields to associate each record with the corresponding worker.

data.value: Create a form containing minimal fields.

data.name: CreateView.HelpText.FromExisting
data.value: Create a form containing fields copied from an existing form. Existing records will not be copied.

data.value: Create a form containing fields defined in a form-level template.

data.value: Create a form containing fields defined in a standard worker or incident form.

data.name: RecoverProject.Body.SetStrategy
data.value:
Project: {0}
No file was found in this location. If the project has been moved, you can open it from its new location. If the project no longer exists, you can create a new project or remove it from the list of known projects.

data.name: SetUpProject.Body.SetStrategy
data.value: A project represents a set of data collection forms. It consists of an Epi Info project (.prj) file and an underlying database. If you choose to create a new project, ERHMS Info Manager will ensure that the database exists and has been initialized for use with Epi Info.

data.name: SetUpProject.HelpText.Create
data.value: Create a new Epi Info project (.prj) file connected to a new or existing database.

data.name: SetUpProject.HelpText.Open
data.value: Open an existing Epi Info project (.prj) file connected to an existing database.

data.name: SetUpProject.Lead.SetStrategy
data.value: Choose how to set up the project
